mapper.select: SELECT * FROM P#DICT_T_FACTOR T WHERE T.COLUMNID=#{factorId} AND T.YEAR=#{finyear} and T.status='1'
mapper.update:
UPDATE P#DICT_T_FACTOR
COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID}, TABLEID = #{TABLEID},
DEID = #{DEID},
NAME = #{NAME},
DBCOLUMNNAME = #{DBCOLUMNNAME},
DATATYPE = #{DATATYPE},
DATALENGTH = #{DATALENGTH},
SCALE = #{SCALE},
NULLABLE = #{NULLABLE},
DEFAULTVALUE = #{DEFAULTVALUE},
CSID = #{CSID},
ISUPDATE = #{ISUPDATE},
ORDERID = #{ORDERID},
SUPERID = #{SUPERID},
ISLEAF = #{ISLEAF},
LEVELNO = #{LEVELNO},
ALIAS = #{ALIAS},
COLFORMAT = #{COLFORMAT},
SHOWFORMAT = #{SHOWFORMAT},
SHOWWIDTH = #{SHOWWIDTH},
ISKEY = #{ISKEY},
ISVISIBLE = #{ISVISIBLE},
ISRESERVE = #{ISRESERVE},
ISSUM = #{ISSUM},
ISREGEX = #{ISREGEX},
REGEXPR = #{REGEXPR},
REGEXPRINFO = #{REGEXPRINFO},
ISBANDCOL = #{ISBANDCOL},
BANDCOLUMNID = #{BANDCOLUMNID},
BANDREFDWCOL = #{BANDREFDWCOL},
EXTPROP = #{EXTPROP},
COLTIPS = #{COLTIPS},
FRMTABID = #{FRMTABID},
FRMCOLID = #{FRMCOLID},
ISVIRTUAL = #{ISVIRTUAL},
VIRCONTEXT = #{VIRCONTEXT},
BGTLVL = #{BGTLVL},
ISHREF = #{ISHREF},
HREFLOC = #{HREFLOC},
HREFPARMID = #{HREFPARMID}, OPENWINDOWTYPE = #{OPENWINDOWTYPE},
PARENTNODECANCHECK = #{PARENTNODECANCHECK},
INSERTVERSION = #{INSERTVERSION},
YEAR = #{FINYEAR},
PROVINCE = #{PROVINCE},
DBVERSION = #{DBVERSION}
COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID} and TABLEID=#{TABLEID} and YEAR=#{FINYEAR} and status='1'
mapper.insert: insert into p#dict_t_factor (year, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, isreserve, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion) select ${finyear}, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, isreserve, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion from p#dict_t_Factor where tableId = #{tableId} and status='1' and year = Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR')

insert into p#dict_t_factor (year, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, isreserve, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion) select year, ${province}, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, ${isreserve}, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion from p#dict_t_Factor where tableId = #{tableId} and status='1' and PROVINCE=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') and year = Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and columnid not in(select f.columnid from p#dict_t_Factor f where f.province=#{province})

insert into p#dict_t_factor (year, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, isreserve, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion) select ${finyear}, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, nullable, defaultvalue, csid, isupdate, dbversion, orderid, superid, isleaf, levelno, alias, colformat, showformat, showwidth, iskey, isvisible, isreserve, issum, isregex, regexpr, regexprinfo, isbandcol, bandrefdwcol, extprop, coltips, frmtabid, frmcolid, isvirtual, vircontext, ishref, hrefloc, hrefparmid, openwindowtype, bgtlvl, status, bandcolumnid, parentnodecancheck, insertversion from p#dict_t_Factor where columnId = #{factorId} and status='1' and year = Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR')

INSERT INTO dict_t_factor ( TABLEID, DEID, COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE, ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL,BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP, COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT, BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID,OPENWINDOWTYPE,PARENTNODECANCHECK ) VALUES ( #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbcolumnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datalength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nullable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isupdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isleaf,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{levelno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colformat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showformat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showwidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iskey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isvisible,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isreserve,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{issum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isregex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{regexpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regexprinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbandcol,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bandcolumnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bandrefdwcol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coltips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frmtabid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frmcolid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvirtual,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vircontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgtlvl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ishref,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hrefloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hrefparmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openwindowtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentNodeCanCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dict_t_factor SET COLUMNID = #{columnid}, TABLEID = #{tableid}, DEID = #{deid}, NAME = #{name}, DBCOLUMNNAME = #{dbcolumnname}, DATATYPE = #{datatype}, DATALENGTH = #{datalength}, SCALE = #{scale}, NULLABLE = #{nullable}, DEFAULTVALUE = #{defaultvalue}, CSID = #{csid}, ISUPDATE = #{isupdate}, ORDERID = #{orderid}, SUPERID = #{superid}, ISLEAF = #{isleaf}, LEVELNO = #{levelno}, ALIAS = #{alias}, COLFORMAT = #{colformat}, SHOWFORMAT = #{showformat}, SHOWWIDTH = #{showwidth}, ISKEY = #{iskey}, ISVISIBLE = #{isvisible}, ISRESERVE = #{isreserve}, ISSUM = #{issum}, ISREGEX = #{isregex}, REGEXPR = #{regexpr}, REGEXPRINFO = #{regexprinfo}, ISBANDCOL = #{isbandcol}, BANDCOLUMNID = #{bandcolumnid}, BANDREFDWCOL = #{bandrefdwcol}, EXTPROP = #{extprop}, COLTIPS = #{coltips}, FRMTABID = #{frmtabid}, FRMCOLID = #{frmcolid}, ISVIRTUAL = #{isvirtual}, VIRCONTEXT = #{vircontext}, BGTLVL = #{bgtlvl}, ISHREF = #{ishref}, HREFLOC = #{hrefloc}, HREFPARMID = #{hrefparmid}, OPENWINDOWTYPE = #{openwindowtype}, PARENTNODECANCHECK = #{parentNodeCanCheck} WHERE COLUMNID = #{columnid}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(T.ORDERID),0) AS ORDERID FROM DICT_T_FACTOR T WHERE T.TABLEID = #{tableid} AND T.SUPERID = #{superid}
mapper.update: BEGIN FOR C_TAB IN (SELECT TABLEID, NAME, APPID FROM DICT_T_MODEL WHERE TABLEID = #{tableID}) LOOP UPDATE DICT_T_FACTOR X SET LEVELNO = (SELECT LVL FROM (SELECT TABLEID, COLUMNID, LEVEL LVL FROM DICT_T_FACTOR Y WHERE TABLEID = C_TAB.TABLEID CONNECT BY SUPERID = PRIOR COLUMNID START WITH SUPERID = '0') T WHERE TABLEID = X.TABLEID AND COLUMNID = X.COLUMNID) WHERE TABLEID = C_TAB.TABLEID AND LEVELNO <> (SELECT LVL FROM (SELECT TABLEID, COLUMNID, LEVEL LVL FROM DICT_T_FACTOR Y WHERE TABLEID = C_TAB.TABLEID CONNECT BY SUPERID = PRIOR COLUMNID START WITH SUPERID = '0') T WHERE TABLEID = X.TABLEID AND COLUMNID = X.COLUMNID); END LOOP; END;
mapper.select: SELECT COLUMNID, DBCOLUMNNAME, MAX(DATATYPE) AS DATATYPE,MAX(DATALENGTH) AS DATALENGTH,ISBANDCOL, ISVIRTUAL,BANDCOLUMNID,BANDREFDWCOL,VIRCONTEXT,MAX(DEFAULTVALUE) AS DEFAULTVALUE,MAX(SCALE) AS SCALE FROM P#DICT_T_FACTOR WHERE TABLEID = #{tableID} AND ISLEAF = '1' AND STATUS = '1' GROUP BY COLUMNID,DBCOLUMNNAME,ISBANDCOL,ISVIRTUAL,BANDCOLUMNID,BANDREFDWCOL,VIRCONTEXT
